page.title: 03TRADING ESTATE SUTTON C'FLD
page.content: {Light industry}conducts its affairs discreetly on the{Reddicap}Trading Estate.Screened from most housing by trees and embankments it adjoins the open space of Rectory Park.Access via the sharp turn off Coleshill Road is difficult for juggernauts. Engineering,plastics and other manufacturing occupies most of the 20 premises.{Service industries}such as removal and painting contractors provide variety. { Products}made here range from rubber gaskets for the motor trade,metal rivets for construction,plate racks for the kitchen, electronic valves and controls for gas appliances,plastic moulding such as torch and camera shells and printed circuit boards. Recent encouragement has led to the setting up of{small businesses}in individual workshops.
